users.projectHopes: Wir glauben, dass EntwicklerInnen wirtschaftlichen Erfolg verdient haben und KonsumentInnen sich an den kreativen Produkten erfreuen k√∂nnen. Es soll nicht daran scheitern, dass die Produkte nicht gefunden werden.

users.title: Software Engineering
users.bio: BSc. Business Administration - BSc. Computer Science - IT-Security Consultant by Day - Developer for Vulperax by Night

users.title: Head of Marketing
users.bio: Sophia is responsible for all creative work at Vulperax. She takes care of public relations and marketing. On the side, I blog about my outdoor experiences on my own travel and outdoor blog Sophias Welt, talk with interview guests on my podcast about travel and sustainable living. Vulperax and Monastery Society, my first PC game, are my entry into an industry I've always dreamed of working in.
